tag_list: seesmic, cathy, brooks, leweb, other-than-that, story-navigation, doat, storytelling, business-development, evangelism, the-conversation
overview: Her first grade report card said it all. “Cathy likes to participate in any project, so long as she gets to talk.” That hasn’t changed. As a Journalist, Cathy’s experience encompasses reporting, writing, editing, broadcast management, and media training and strategy development - with an emphasis on helping clients work with the broadcast media.

degrees.subject: Journalism
degrees.institution: Northwestern University - Medill School of Journalism
